name: Game Jam of the Week 140
description:
Made for Game Jam of the Week 140... 

I'm thinking something like.. Simple nostaligic Space Flight Sim... (I kinda moved away from the theme.. but I started out with having different cargo pods for the player to try out.. .. .. so "shapeshift"... working on it.. 

Instructions 

Up Thrusters
1 Thrusters off
2 Thrusters set for sof landing
3 liftoff thrusters
4 GTFOF speed of use Left Shift
Spacebar, Forward Thrusters
Q, E for Yaw
W, S for Pitch
A, D for Roll   ESCAPE TO QUIT

Day 2, I feel pretty good. got a simple moon flight simulator going after 2 days. 

day 1 Plan is to have Player take off,  go to hazardous area on far side, rescue workers at facility, return to base... maybe have time for a second trip before the facility blows up. 

I'm not quite happy with the Moon yet, and I'm getting all sorts of collider and drawing issues.. because of the size, I think.
